info.label: Software engineer
info.brief: Seeking a software engineering position where I can further develop my variety of skills in a fast-paced agile driven team.

history.summary: Perform duties of software analysis, design, and construction
highlights: Ongoing development on a growing health platform for helping people offer resources and find services to answer various social determinants of health
Robert Wood Johnson Foundation’s Catalyst @ Health 2.0 phase 1 finalist
Designed and built high function prototypes of service provider web portal and consumer interface
Ongoing development in cross platform Smart Community Health app

history.summary: **The Pitch:** Provide affordable and scalable custom-built technologies and solutions to improve small business’ production and work flow
highlights: Researched and began to learn new technologies to develop new skills to provide services to small businesses in order to update technological infrastructure
Custom website services, database management, custom embedded projects, Small business ERP / SaaS

history.summary: Automated Document generation and in-house middleware
highlights: Worked on enterprise automated financial and medical document generation API and Middleware using an existing Java enterprise system to provide support to SaaS development team
Wrote and troubleshot multiple middleware services to handle the testing of SOAP requests for the platform
Promoted and utilized solid Agile methodologies to work within the team

history.summary: Derived user stories from the business partners and delegated tasks to developers for implementation and testing
highlights: Verified and validated the user stories using an ATDD approach and delivered bi-weekly updates to business partners

projects.title: Virtual Tour Creation tool
projects.summary: Analyze, design and construct web deployable software that allows a user to create 3D virtual tours withno programming experience using basic web technologies
projects.description: Software that adds a user friendly interface to allow non technically inclined users to create virtual tours using 3d pictures and a pan-able 3d environment
highlights: Co-developed System Requirements Specification, Software Design Document, and Technical Design Document. Designed and wrote web service to serve page content and manipulate and stored images and data. Utilized Agile Sprints to plan work
Received acceptance from Director of Admissions and Dean of COSE to move prototype towards implementing the project into St Cloud State’s ecosystem

projects.title: Data Visualization Tool
projects.summary: Plot 4-dimensional student data from SCSU in VR using Unity to make complex data viewable and visualize regression models among other forms of analysis
highlights: Co-developed and researched the topic alongside a math grad student. Design in-simulation GUI to manipulate the data sets in real time.
Worked together with co-author to present a research paper and present at the university research colloquium

education.summary: St. Cloud State University Bachelor of Science in Engineering
education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Software Engineering

history.title: BSSE
history.summary: First graduating class of St. Cloud State University Software Engineering program 2018

sets.name: Deployment Environments
skills: Containerized deployments and CICD (Docker / Docker Compose)
